title: Course detail navigation, INR pricing consistency, and responsive medium-density course layouts

requirements.summary: Make Courses page Enroll Now reliably navigate to /courses/$courseId and ensure INR price formatting with a friendly not-found state.
acceptanceCriteria: From the Courses page, clicking "Enroll Now" on any course opens that course’s detail page (URL matches /courses/<courseId>).
The Course Detail page displays the selected course’s price using INR formatting (₹ and Indian digit grouping), consistent with the Courses list.
If an invalid courseId is visited, a user-friendly "Course Not Found" state is shown with a working "Back to Courses" action.

file_operations.description: Ensure the "Enroll Now" action uses TanStack Router navigation/linking to /courses/$courseId with the selected course.id (no stale/incorrect IDs), and keep price display using formatINR. Use shadcn-ui Button/Card composition (do not modify files under frontend/src/components/ui). Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Confirm the detail page reads courseId from the route params, formats price via formatINR, and presents a user-friendly "Course Not Found" state with a working "Back to Courses" action. Use shadcn-ui Card/Button for the not-found UI without editing read-only ui components. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Verify INR formatting behavior (₹ symbol + en-IN digit grouping) remains consistent for both course list and detail; adjust only if needed to match acceptance criteria.

requirements.summary: Refine Course Detail page to a fully responsive, medium-density reading layout with full, untruncated description text.
acceptanceCriteria: On mobile and tablet widths, the Course Detail page content stacks cleanly without overlapping or horizontal scrolling.
The course description text on the Course Detail page renders fully without line-clamp, truncation, or hidden overflow (all text remains readable).
Typography and spacing on the Course Detail page feel “medium” density (not oversized like a hero, not cramped like small print), including the description and key metadata blocks.

file_operations.description: Adjust layout classes to improve responsiveness (clean stacking on small/medium screens, prevent horizontal overflow) and tune typography/spacing to a medium-density reading experience. Ensure description rendering uses styles that never clamp/truncate or hide overflow. Keep changes at page-level via classNames/composition using shadcn-ui Card/Badge/Button (ui components are read-only). Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

If necessary to enforce non-truncation and medium-density typography consistently on the Course Detail page, add or adjust project-level utility classes/styles in this global entry point (without touching shadcn/ui source).

requirements.summary: Ensure Courses page card descriptions are fully readable (no truncation) across breakpoints while maintaining a stable responsive card layout.
acceptanceCriteria: On the Courses page, each course card’s description is fully readable (no ellipsis truncation or CSS line-clamp).
The course card layout remains responsive and visually consistent even when descriptions vary in length.
No course card content (price, buttons, metadata) is pushed off-screen or becomes inaccessible due to longer descriptions.

file_operations.description: Replace/avoid any potentially truncating CardDescription usage for course descriptions by rendering description text with explicit non-clamping styles (e.g., normal whitespace and no line-clamp) while keeping the card responsive and ensuring the CTA/price remain accessible. Continue composing with shadcn-ui Card/Button/Badge without modifying read-only ui component files. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

If the existing card description styling applies truncation via shared styles, introduce a safe override utility/class (used only by the Courses page) to guarantee descriptions remain fully visible across responsive breakpoints.
